m_szDocSumamry: A new family of solid polymer electrolytes In the wake of high-profile battery fires, a safer approach emerges Comments | Print This | Subscribe | Email Us As news reports of lithium-ion battery (LIB) fires in Boeing Dreamliner planes and Tesla electric cars remind us, these batteries — which are in everyday portable devices, like tablets and smartphones — have their downsides. Now, scientists have designed a safer kind of lithium battery component that is far less likely to catch fire and still promises effective performance.
